amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to require the Corps to take steps to better engage with and meaningfully consult with communities of color, low-income communities, tribes, and rural communities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Ms. Moore.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
